attributes.action: urge Alpen to abandon the "new and improved" recipe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new and dis-improved recipe is a different cereal altogether. Both the taste and the texture have been changed beyond recognition

If anyone else feels strongly about this  you should write to  Weetabix at:

Consumer Services
Weetabix Limited
Burton Latimer
Kettering
Northamptonshire
NN15 5JR
England

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
